title: Morristown National Historical Park: Our Staff & Offices
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Management     Our Staff & Offices              Our Staff & Offices        N A M E / T I T L E / P H O N E / E M A I L  Administration Thomas Ross Superintendent 973-539-2016 x 200/ e-mail us Anne DeGraaf Management Assistant 973-539-2016 x 201/ e-mail us Sheila Hamilton  Administrative Officer 973-539-2016 x207/ e-mail us Claudia Mosquera Administrative Technician 973-539-2016 x209/ e-mail us Curatorial Jude Pfister Chief of Cultural Resources 973-539-2016 x204/ e-mail us  Joni Rowe Museum Specialist 973-539-2016 x203/ e-mail us Sarah Minegar Museum Technician 973-539-2016 x215/ e-mail us Maintenance Christopher Castillo Maintenance Supervisor 973-518-8943 / e-mail us Wade Miller Maintenance Mechanic 973-539-4608/ e-mail us Gerald Molnar Painter 973-267-5911/ e-mail us Kevin Scheirer  Maintenance Worker 973-267-5911/ e-mail us Interpretation & Education Vanessa Smiley Chief of Interpretation & Education 973-539-2016 x260 / e-mail us   Eric Olsen Park Ranger 973-285-0126 / e-mail us Thomas Winslow Park Ranger 973-285-0126/ e-mail us Kevin Hanley Park Ranger 973-539-2016 x210/ e-mail us Pamela Dobben Park Guide 973-539-2016 x210/ e-mail us John Hazel Park Guide 973-539-2016 x210/ e-mail us Kim Watts Park Guide 973-539-2016 x210/ e-mail us Law Enforcement Tim Socha Chief Ranger 973-543-7958/ e-mail us Peter Leon     Park Ranger, Law Enforcement 973-543-7958/ e-mail us Andrew Ginrich  Park Ranger, Law Enforcement 973-543-7958/ e-mail us John Castaldo    Park Ranger, Law Enforcement 973-543-7958/ e-mail us Natural Resources Robert Masson Biologist 908-766-6841 / e-mail us        All inquires can be made by sending them to: Morristown National Historical Park 30 Washington Place Morristown, NJ 07960
